snippet: The preliminary injunction issued by Judge Peter C. Economus was a setback for Gov. John R. Kasich, and could affect the upcoming elections in Ohio, a closely contested swing state.
abstract: Judge Peter C Economus blocks Ohio's cuts to early voting, saying they would disproportionately affect poor and minority voters; orders state to put in place additional polling days prior to November's elections.
lead_paragraph: The preliminary injunction issued by Judge Peter C. Economus was a setback for Gov. John R. Kasich, and could affect the upcoming elections in Ohio, a closely contested swing state.

headline.main: Federal Judge Orders Ohio to Undo Cuts to Early Voting
headline.print_headline: Federal Judge Orders Ohio to Undo Cuts to Early Voting
